questions.question: What is the dominant color of the memory card's casing?
What is the primary brand name visible on the card?
What is the indicated storage capacity in gigabytes, as shown numerically?
What is the shape of the depicted memory card?
What type of memory card is shown, based on its physical form factor?
What is the material of the memory card's visible surface, appearing smooth?
What is the color of the small marking next to the 'LOCK' indicator?
What is the descriptive word next to the brand name, in smaller font?
What design element is seen repeatedly, forming a subtle pattern?
What text indicates a data protection mechanism on the card?
What is the unit abbreviation after the numerical storage value?
What is the apparent finish of the casing; glossy or matte?
Besides the numerical value, what other value indicates storage size?
Is the card depicted in a fully inserted or fully removed state?
What is the small symbol in the top-right corner that resembles a sideways 'S'?
